sentences.english: He was a man whoseorigin was unknown and who disappeared without leaving a trace.
sentences.chinese: 他的身世未知，但消失的时候又不留一丝痕迹。

sentences.english: The Hutongs are full of history.
sentences.chinese: 胡同里充满了历史的痕迹。

sentences.english: The juice he spilled left an indelible mark on the carpet.
sentences.chinese: 他泼出来的果汁在地毯上留下了去不掉的痕迹。

sentences.english: Apply trace technique is a kind of technique that can diagnose and resolve the molding defects.
sentences.chinese: 应用痕迹技术是能够诊断和解决成型件的许多缺陷的。

sentences.english: I could cry but I couldnot erase the crying imprints.
sentences.chinese: 我可以哭但是却擦不掉哭泣的痕迹。

sentences.english: Police believe the perpetrators who should be left scratch marks on her tower.
sentences.chinese: 警方相信凶手身上应留有姬塔抓伤的痕迹。

sentences.english: In crime case spot, the shoe imprints is one of most common traces.
sentences.chinese: 在刑事犯罪案件现场，鞋印是最为常见的痕迹之一。

sentences.english: Some appear to have been attacked by the beaks of other cephalopods.
sentences.chinese: 有些牙印似乎是被其他头足纲攻击的痕迹。

sentences.english: This gets the mark of travel for sarcoptic mite.
Ian Teh has donated this photograph taken in Inner Mongolia from the series Traces.
sentences.chinese: 郑永仁从内蒙古痕迹系列捐赠一张照片作是次拍卖。

sentences.english: Sorrow had left its traces on her face.
sentences.chinese: 悲愁在她的脸上留下了痕迹。

sentences.english: A contrail is the visible vapor trail behind airplanes or rockets traveling at high altitudes.
sentences.chinese: 这团痕迹可能是飞机或火箭飞上高空后留下的航迹云。

sentences.english: To mark or mottle with spots.
There are no bludgeon marks on the surviving skeletons .
sentences.chinese: 头颅上也没有棍击的痕迹。
这里到处都充满着向加加林致敬的痕迹。

definition: veined pattern/wrinkles/vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
